description:
libmach, cmd/5a, cmd/5c, cmd/5g, cmd/5l: enable DWARF type info for Linux/ARM
Fixes issue 3747.

Update issue 4912
This CL adds gotype into .5 object file.

messages.text:
Wonderful, thank you.

> *** Submitted as
> https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2b17033f6f17 ***

> Linux/ARM
> Fixes issue 3747.
>
> Update issue 4912
> This CL adds gotype into .5 object file.
>
> R=golang-dev, rsc
> CC=golang-dev

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/
This changes the .5 object file format.

LGTM, just revert reg.c

https://codereview.appspot.com/7376054/diff/12001/src/cmd/5g/reg.c
File src/cmd/5g/reg.c (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7376054/diff/12001/src/cmd/5g/reg.c#newcode809
src/cmd/5g/reg.c:809: a->gotype = v->gotype;
Delete.

https://codereview.appspot.com/7376054/diff/12001/src/cmd/5g/reg.c#newcode1016
src/cmd/5g/reg.c:1016: v->gotype = a->gotype;
Delete.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2b17033f6f17 ***

libmach, cmd/5a, cmd/5c, cmd/5g, cmd/5l: enable DWARF type info for Linux/ARM
Fixes issue 3747.
